NodeTreeDataItem Struct Reference

NodeTreeDataItem struct gives access to the current node data during a node tree traversal (using NodeTreeIterator). More...

Public Attributes

NodeTreeData * pData
const Matrix * pParentTransform

Detailed Description

NodeTreeDataItem struct gives access to the current node data during a node tree traversal (using NodeTreeIterator).

The node data can be accessed through the pData member pointer, A nodes's parent world transformation matrix is available through the pParentTransform member pointer.
